lead_paragraph: A man who sued to stop foreclosure of his home shot three law enforcement officers trying to serve an eviction notice Wednesday, killing one and wounding the others, the authorities said.

headline.print_headline: Colorado: Deputy and Suspect Killed During Eviction
headline.main: Colorado: Deputy and Suspect Killed During Eviction

snippet: A man who sued to stop foreclosure of his home shot three law enforcement officers trying to serve an eviction notice Wednesday, killing one and wounding the others, the authorities said.
abstract: Martin Wirth opens fire on three law enforcement officials, killing one, as they attempted to serve eviction notice at his home in Bailey, Colorado; is fatally shot in ensuing gunfire; had filed lawsuit against foreclosure of his home that was dismissed from court.
